item.title: Tour of Karnataka Season 2 – A Rider’s Perspective
item.description: It all began when Cadence90 announced the dates for the second season of Tour of Karnataka (or as we all call it, ToK). A lot of people immediately signed up and we were all pretty excited. Nov 15, 2016 – 6:30 PM, Cadence90, Jayanagar, Bangalore Everyone showed up for the briefing. The mood was festive. Chethan was talking to everyone about the tour, and eventually we were given our goodie bags.
